CustomField.description: Link to Chatter Group where Account Plan is stored. Note: Storing Account Plans in Chatter is an exception to the normal process of uploading it via standard File Upload feature to this Account. Use Chatter method only if strict access control is needed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to Chatter Group where Account Plan is stored. Note: Storing Account Plans in Chatter is an exception to the normal process of uploading it via standard File Upload feature to this Account. Use Chatter method only if strict access control is needed.
CustomField.label: Chatter Group URL to Account Plan
